title: Dark elven long sword
data:
| ) [File:Dark elven long sword.png](/index.php?title=Special:Upload\&wpDestFile=Dark_elven_long_sword.png "File:Dark elven long sword.png") |                                                         |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                                                                       | dark elven long sword                                   |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                 | etched long sword                                       |
| Damage vs. small                                                                                                                           | 1d10                                                    |
| Damage vs. large                                                                                                                           | 1d12                                                    |
| To-hit bonus                                                                                                                               | +0                                                      |
| Weapon skill                                                                                                                               | [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword")             |
| Size                                                                                                                                       | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")             |
| Base price                                                                                                                                 | 80 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                                                                                     | [25](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                             |
| Material                                                                                                                                   | [adamantine](/wiki/Adamantine "Adamantine")             |

A **dark elven long sword** is a type of [weapon](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). It is a one-handed weapon that uses the [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword") [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill"). It is made of [adamantine](/wiki/Adamantine "Adamantine"), and appears as an **etched long sword** when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

## Generation

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven long sword. Drow [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight") begin the game with a +1 dark elven long sword.

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)") [lieutenants](/wiki/Lieutenant "Lieutenant") have a 1⁄4 chance of [generating with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a dark elven long sword, and drow [captains](/wiki/Captain "Captain"), [watch captains](/wiki/Watch_captain "Watch captain") and [prison guards](/wiki/Prison_guard "Prison guard") are always generated with a dark elven long sword. [Driders](/index.php?title=Drider_\(EvilHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drider (EvilHack) (page does not exist)") have an effective 1⁄18 chance of generating with a dark elven long sword, and other non-[undead](/wiki/Undead "Undead") drow have an effective 1⁄16 chance of generating with a dark elven long sword, with the exception of [drow mages](/index.php?title=Drow_mage\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drow mage (page does not exist)") and [drow clerics](/index.php?title=Drow_cleric\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drow cleric (page does not exist)").

A dark elven long sword can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining 2 [dark elven short swords](/wiki/Dark_elven_short_sword_\(EvilHack\) "Dark elven short sword (EvilHack)") while the forge is darkened.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dark_elven_long_sword\&action=edit)*
html:
Dark elven long sword

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
) File:Dark elven long sword.png
Name dark elven long sword
Appearance etched long sword
Damage vs. small 1d10
Damage vs. large 1d12
To-hit bonus +0
Weapon skill long sword
Size one-handed
Base price 80 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 25
Material adamantine

A dark elven long sword is a type of weapon that appears in EvilHack. It is a one-handed weapon that uses the long sword skill. It is made of adamantine, and appears as an etched long sword when unidentified.

Generation

Drow characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven long sword. Drow Knights begin the game with a +1 dark elven long sword.

Drow lieutenants have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with a dark elven long sword, and drow captains, watch captains and prison guards are always generated with a dark elven long sword. Driders have an effective 1⁄18 chance of generating with a dark elven long sword, and other non-undead drow have an effective 1⁄16 chance of generating with a dark elven long sword, with the exception of drow mages and drow clerics.

A dark elven long sword can be created at a forge by combining 2 dark elven short swords while the forge is darkened.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''dark elven long sword''' is a type of [[weapon]] that appears in [[EvilHack]]. It is a one-handed weapon that uses the [[long sword]] [[skill]]. It is made of [[adamantine]], and appears as an '''etched long sword''' when [[identification|unidentified]].

==Generation==
[[Drow (starting race)|Drow]] characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven long sword. Drow [[Knight]]s begin the game with a +1 dark elven long sword.

[[Drow (monster attribute)|Drow]] [[lieutenant]]s have a {{frac|4}} chance of [[Monster starting inventory|generating with]] a dark elven long sword, and drow [[captain]]s, [[watch captain]]s and [[prison guard]]s are always generated with a dark elven long sword. [[Drider (EvilHack)|Driders]] have an effective {{frac|18}} chance of generating with a dark elven long sword, and other non-[[undead]] drow have an effective {{frac|16}} chance of generating with a dark elven long sword, with the exception of [[drow mage]]s and [[drow cleric]]s.

A dark elven long sword can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining 2 [[Dark elven short sword (EvilHack)|dark elven short swords]] while the forge is darkened.
